text: Mɨdorozim ghuavɨra itima, Sirian mɨdorozir gumazir mam, uan barir pimɨn Israelia iti naghɨn puram asavamada. Ezɨ barim ghua Ahapɨn mɨkarzir, mɨdorozir korotiam avarazir puvatɨzim gasara. Ezɨ Ahap uan karisɨn suizir gumazim mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ ikuvigha gɨfa. Nɨ zuamɨra ua karis giragh mɨdorozir danganim atakigh.”
